detail.installNote: This integration will be added to your organization. Configure the required fields below.
detail.zeroConfigNote: This integration requires no additional configuration and will be installed immediately.
detail.legalText: I have read and accept the <legalLink>terms of use</legalLink>.
detail.adminOnly: Only organization admins can install integrations.

missingIdentifier.title: Missing Integration Identifier
missingIdentifier.description: No integration identifier was provided. Please use a valid install link from the marketplace.

notFound.title: Integration Not Found
notFound.description: The requested integration could not be found in the marketplace. It may have been removed or unpublished.

fetchFailed.title: Unable to Load Integration
fetchFailed.description: Could not load integration details from the marketplace. Please try again later.

error.unavailable: The marketplace is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
error.oauthNotSupported: OAuth integrations are not yet supported.
error.missingRequiredConfig: Please fill in all required fields.

adminRequired.title: Admin Access Required
adminRequired.description: You need administrator privileges to install integrations.

error.alreadyInstalled: This integration is already installed in your organization.
error.generic: Something went wrong while installing the integration. Please try again.
